price: Maaliif yeroo isa (soba kana) dhageessan, mu’uminoonni dhiiraas ta’ee kan dubaraa, lubbuulee isaaniitiif (wal jiddutti) toltuu yaadanii “Kun soba ifa bahaadha” jechuu dhaban?
arabic: لَّوۡلَآ إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ ظَنَّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتُ بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا وَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lawlā idh samiʿ'tumūhu ẓanna al-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu bi-anfusihim khayran waqālū hādhā if'kun mubīnun
